迃字的基本解释

迃
yū
古同“迂”。

迃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yū］
［《廣韻》羽俱切，平虞，云。］
［《廣韻》憶俱切，平虞，影。］
［《廣韻》於武切，上麌，影。］
“于3”的被通假字。亦作“迃1”。
(1)迂回；曲折。
(2)指迂回曲折的路。
(3)远。
(4)广大。
(5)迂腐，不合事理。
(6)邪僻，不正。
(7)指使邪僻。
(8)夸诞不实。
(9)缓慢。
(10)劳神或枉屈尊长之敬词。
(11)见“迂合”。

迃字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　迃； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1253第23
【正字通】迂本字。又?。

迃字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
迃字的起名意思

暂无。

Yi
Basic explanation of words
Yi
yū
Gu Tong is "roundabout".
Yi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yū］
["Guangyun" feather all cut, Pingyu, cloud. ]
["Guangyun" recalls all cut, Pingyu, shadow. ]
["Guangyun" Yu Wuqie, Shangzhe, Ying. ]
"Yu 3" was passed falsely. Also known as "迃1".
(1) Roundabout; twists and turns.
(2) Refers to a winding road.
(3) Far away.
(4) The vastness.
(5) Pedigree and unreasonable.
(6) Evil and unrighteous.
(7) Instruct evil.
(8) Exaggeration is not true.
(9) Slow.
(10) Respect words for labor or condescension.
(11) See "roundabout".
Yi

[You Ji 2] [The Department of Characters] 　迃; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1253 Page 23
【Zhengzitong】The original character is detour. also?.
